column4: anyone had issues with the Nvidia drivers crapping out in Lucid?
: Depends what are you trying to do..?
had the driver fail and bring the whole system down last time I installed it
so I haven't installed it again yet, want to find out if its a known issue
: Please specify you Hardware!
intel core 2 2.2ghz, 2gb ram, Onboard video Nvidia on board chip
think its a geforce 7 series
: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport
I'll check it out
do you know a tool to get the hardware info?
: dmesg
: Out-Put http://ubuntu.pastebin.com
s'all right, I'll work through it
: Out-Put  ???
I'm working from home today, so can't get into that now, running the hardware testing to see what it comes up with
looks like its a geforce 7100 chip, which is not listed as supported on the site you sent me to, thanks
: Don't jump to conclusion so soon ! try getting more help.
last time I installed it, worked for several days
then completely killed the system
: It is not working since the recent update!! ?
haven't tried to load it again, I reinstalled the whole os since I hadn't really done much yet
